name: GeoCrush
description:
This short puzzle game is a submission to the GeoJam hosted by Indie Game Dev Youtuber Icoso.

The Theme is "The Other Side" - try to anticipate the other side of the shapes to solve the puzzle with as few moves as possible.

The rules are simple and similarities to existing crushing puzzle games is purely coincidential: match 3 or more of the same shape and color to crush them, complete all 5 levels.
